Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: 1 if user story is selected for the current sprint, else 0

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: 1 if feature is included in the upcoming release, else 0

Name: allocate_task_effort
Description: Effort hours allocated to a task within the sprint

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Planned working priority for a user story during sprint

Name: team_capacity_committed
Description: Story points the team commits for the sprint

Name: activate_blocker_resolution
Description: 1 if blocker is scheduled for resolution in sprint, else 0

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: 1 if worker is assigned to a given task, else 0

Name: qa_test_allocation
Description: Number of test cases planned for a user story

Name: code_review_required
Description: 1 if code review is mandated for the task, else 0

Name: bugfix_story_points_buffer
Description: Story points buffer reserved for bug fixes

Name: ci_pipeline_gate_level
Description: Number of mandatory CI gates before merge

Name: release_batch_size
Description: Count of features per release batch
